general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and departments within Sharda University, including its Schools of Dental, Medical, and Nursing Sciences. It also lists key reports and initiatives such as the Examination Annual Report, Academic Bank of Credits, Curricula Feedback, and University Brochure. The content further details aspects of university life and operations, including leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, acts, ordinances, COVID-19 information, counselling services, skill enhancement programs, entrepreneurship initiatives, FM radio, visa and insurance guidelines, a mentoring portal, and international programs, with mentions of Sharda University's campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra.

career_path.summary: This program offers career paths in Special Protection Security Management and as an Advocate & Legal Consultant. Graduates typically receive an average annual package ranging from 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Special Protection Security Manager
• Advocate & Legal Consultant
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 3.20 LPA to 4.50 LPA
